title: Call Me The Mother of Quick Transmigration - Novel Updates
tags: Calm Protagonist   Childcare   Doting Parents   Female Protagonist   Previous Life Talent   Quirky Characters   Romantic Subplot   Single Parent   System Administrator   Transmigration   Transplanted Memories   World Hopping   World Travel
author: Aunt Ninja   忍者阿姨
description:
Li Su, who was infertile and divorced, accidentally came across a system. She travelled through world after world and finally fulfilled her wish to be a mother. But why was it that the children the system assigned her were so weird? 

But it didn’t matter, because I am your mother!>
